meanings: (쓰레기 등을) throw away, throw out, dump, (informal) junk
(포기하다, 떠나다) desert, leave, abandon, (literary) forsake, give up
초대와 방문 I missed the bus.
초대와 방문 The train stopped along the way.
초대와 방문 The train stopped for some time along the way.

vlive.korean: 다섯 번째로 훅 넘어가버려서 죄송해요~ I almost went straight to the fifth one. 듣기 View video VICTON : 병찬이의 심야라디오📻🌙
vlive.english: I almost went straight to the fifth one.

vlive.korean: 근데 그게 고장나버려서... But that my curtains are broken. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 현진이의 고민상담소 첫번째❣️
vlive.english: But that my curtains are broken.

vlive.korean: [저세상 귀여움을 접해버려서 이 세상 바이 합니다] 빈바이로 할래요? [I'm going to pass out because of their overwhelming cuteness] Should we use BIN-BYE? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] 나 기원전 00년생인데 0304형아즈 귀여워서 혼절해따,,(º﹃º):.♡* (SF9 talking about their cute episode)
vlive.english: [I'm going to pass out because of their overwhelming cuteness] Should we use BIN-BYE?

vlive.korean: 아 저는 하고 싶었는데! 그렇게 못해서요 처음 몇 주를 놓쳐버려서... I wanted to do it, but I didn't get the chance to because I missed that on the first few weeks. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 53 - SEASON 2
vlive.english: I wanted to do it, but I didn't get the chance to because I missed that on the first few weeks.

vlive.korean: 너무 늦어 버려서~ It became so late! 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 🌙

examples.korean: I was forced to take a taxi because the last bus had left. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 막차가 떠나 버려서 할 수 없이 택시를 타야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I was forced to take a taxi because the last bus had left. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: People, even more than things, have to be restored, renewed, revived, reclaimed, and redeemed; never throw out anyone. (Audrey Hepburn) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 재산보다는 사람들이야말로 회복돼야 하고, 새로워져야하고, 활기를 얻고,깨우치고, 구원받아야한다. 결코 누구도 버려서는 안 된다. (오드리 햅번, 인생명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: People, even more than things, have to be restored, renewed, revived, reclaimed, and redeemed; never throw out anyone. (Audrey Hepburn) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Now I’m wide awake and probably won’t be able to fall back asleep. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이제 완전히 깨버려서 다시 잠들긴 어려울 것 같아. DARAKWON
examples.english: Now I’m wide awake and probably won’t be able to fall back asleep. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Now she’s caught up in a love triangle and doesn’t know what to do. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이제 그녀는 삼각관계에 빠져버려서 어떻게 해야 할지 모르고 있어. DARAKWON
examples.english: Now she’s caught up in a love triangle and doesn’t know what to do. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It sucks this ended up being a throwaway track, it would have really fit the album! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 노래가 결국 앨범 삭제곡이 돼버려서 안 됐어. 앨범에 딱 어울렸을 텐데! DARAKWON
examples.english: It sucks this ended up being a throwaway track, it would have really fit the album! Add to Wordbook
